title: 0xc00005
body: how can i dont have my problem anymore?

replies.body:
This is usually caused by a third party program (often Antivirus) blocking League from running properly. I recommend [disabling potentially problematic applications](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to prevent this from happening again.

Let me know if this helped out!
